meta.title: From DEAD to OUTLAW
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: We're honoring the Tony nominations this week. "Dead Outlaw" is a dark comedy about Elmer McCurdy, an Oklahoma outlaw whose dies in a shootout and then earns posthumous fame as a traveling mummified sideshow attraction. The show has seven nominations, including Best Musical.

Replace the last four letters of <> with two letters to get a number
Swap one letter of <> to get a Bowie song title
